name: The Absynthium Taproom
intro_scene: You peel back the glowing green curtain… and the vapor hits your face like regret in your 30s.
visual_theme: Low lighting, glowing green fog, cracked absinthe bottle bar
satire_note: Bartender insists, 'We used to use actual wormwood, until the lawsuits.'

name: Three-Crown Keg Haus
intro_scene: The smell hits you first: sweat, sour hops, and a whiff of something legally inadvisable.
visual_theme: Gritty dive bar, flickering mini-keg chandelier
obstacle_type: Stealth tile puzzle (avoid creaks and drunks)
satire_note: Sign reads, 'Noble by name, not by health code.'

name: The Tap Dat Vault
location: Clocktower Plaza, hidden switch at midnight
intro_scene: A bass drop echoes as the vault creaks open. You step into what feels like a nightclub inside a GPU.
visual_theme: Cyberpunk basement, brewing vats look like chemistry rigs
obstacle_type: Rhythm puzzle synced to glitch beat
satire_note: We don’t serve beer — we *inhale* it.

name: Ye Olde B.R.E.W. Lab
location: Velvet Curtain Club, basement behind staff-only rope
intro_scene: A robotic voice greets you: 'Welcome to the Brewvolution™ — your mouth is now under analysis.'
visual_theme: Retrofuturistic lab with blue lights and robotic bartender

mini_mob.name: Fermenting Algorithm
mini_mob.effect: Random status (Grease Fingers, Thirsty, or Inspired)

satire_note: Brew flavor dictated by today’s trending NFT hash… it’s decentralizzzzzted.
